#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#define M 100010
using namespace std;
int main()
{
      char s[M];
      cin>>s;
      int i,j,cnt=0,c;
      char a,asc=256;
      for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
      {
             j=i+1;c=1;
           while(s[j]==s[i])
           {
                 a=s[j];
                 c++;
                 j++;

           }
           if(c>cnt)
           {cnt=c;
           asc=a;}
           if(c==cnt)
           {
                 if(asc>a)
                 {
                 cnt=c;
                 asc=a;
                 }
           }

      }
      printf("%c\n",asc);
      printf("%d\n",cnt);
}
